Package personalfinances

Class PersonalFinances

java.lang.Object
personalfinances.PersonalFinances
public class PersonalFinances extends Object
A class designed to form an array of transaction objects and add the data
from a given file to it to form a reciept of transactions.

      Sorts the transactions array by check number.

      public void swap(int i, int j)
      Switches the position of two values within an array.

      Parameters:
      i - the index of one of the items to be swapped.
      j - the index of the other item to be swapped.

    • printCategorySubTotals

      public String printCategorySubTotals()
      Creates a formatted string of all transactions by category.

      Returns:
      a formatted string of transactions by category.

    • printRegister

      public String printRegister(double balance)
      Creates a formatted string of all transactions and a balance
      by check number.

      Parameters:
      balance - the balance argument passed from the command line
      Returns:
      a formatted string of transactions by check number.

    • run

      public void run(String[] args)
      The run method reads the file passed from the arguments array. Prints
      the string returned from printCategorySubTotals(), then prints
      the string returned from printRegister() after passing it the balance
      from args.

      Parameters:
      args - command line arguments passed from main

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      The program driver

      Parameters:
      args - the command line arguments
